column6: The mystery of the tempest-tossed island continues to thicken as the Hulk finds himself in a major smackdown with a "smash"-ing monster; at the same time, details of a tragic incident in his youth are seemingly an open book to the mysterious individual overseeing all that transpires there.
column8: | writer:Peter David | colorist:Edgar Delgado | letterer:Randy Gentile | inker:Tom Palmer | penciller (cover):Lee Weeks
